q: In a statement, he said it had been "a privilege and an honour to work for David Cameron for three-and-a-half years" and he was proud of the work he had done. But he added: Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110% needed in this role. "I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on.
